import re
from typing import Optional

def read_pattern(text_source, regex: re.Pattern) -> Optional[re.Match]:
    match = regex.match(text_source['contents'], text_source['offset'])
    if not match:
        return None
    text_source[''] = match.end()
    return match

import re
from typing import Optional

def read_pattern(text_source, regex: re.Pattern) -> Optional[re.Match]:
    match = regex.match(text_source['contents'], text_source[''])
    if not match:
        return None
    text_source['offset'] = match.end()
    return match
